title: Illustrated Usk Observer
text: The Illustrated Usk Observer (established in 1855) was a weekly English language newspaper with a <a href="Conservatism">conservative</a> editorial point-of-view. It contained reports focusing on local news and information, with a special focus on agricultural matters and family interests. It was later succeeded by 'The Usk Observer'. Associated titles: "The Usk Observer" (1855–1866).
